page.title: 09EVENTS KIRKBY MALZEARD
page.content: There are few traditional events held in the area but all events organised are well supported.Grewelthorpe and Kirkby have{Gala Days,}centred around sports for the children & contain side shows & attractions.Monies raised from these events go toward the upkeep of the local playing & sports fields. There are{bonfire parties}held in both villages,funds being raised from donations & fireworks purchased & set off by adults. Churches in the area have a{sale on the market cross}at Kirkby Malzeard excercising the right to do so granted by ancient charter. All proceeds to Christian Aid. Every year Kirkby Malzeard produces a {pantomime.}It is organised locally & all proceeds to charity. Kirkby Malzeard has a{Horticultural {Show}supported by approximately 200 people.
